short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivate yourself by measuring your life in days instead of years.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lifeday replaces your default new-tab page in Chrome with the number of days that you have been alive. The hope is that this will help to inspire you to make this day more meaningful, to waste less time, and to work towards those things that might fulfill you most.
